[Page Title: Home - Ciao Bella]

Skip to content View Our Menu Home valorbound 2025-04-06T02:27:50+00:00 
Fine Italian Dining

Ciao Bella Charleston Open Now!
THE BEST TABLE IN TOWN 
Find wonderful food and drink selections!
1759 Savannah Hwy. Charleston, SC 29407 
Get in Touch!
843-556-1111 
At Ciao Bella, we believe the dining experience itself should be savored as much as the flavors on your plate. Our warm, inviting atmosphere is perfect for multigenerational gatherings around a table, intimate twosomes sharing fond moments, or friends relishing lively conversations over wine and song. As an Italian Restaurant in Charleston, we strive to create a welcoming oasis where guests feel at ease savoring both sumptuous flavors and meaningful moments. Our gracious staff is dedicated to surpassing expectations and crafting treasured memories with their exceptional hospitality.
View Menu Drink Menu 
Gallery

News & Articles
Read More News
